title: Forgiveness
verses: Ephesians 4:32 (WEB) — “Be kind… forgiving each other, just as God also in Christ forgave you.”
Colossians 3:13 (WEB) — “Forgiving each other, even as the Lord forgave you.”
Matthew 6:14–15 (WEB) — “If you forgive… your Father will also forgive you.”
body: Forgiveness is costly but freeing. It entrusts justice to God and releases you from bitterness. Forgive from the heart; pursue reconciliation where wise.
prayer: Forgiving Father, as You have forgiven me, help me forgive. Heal my wounds and free me from bitterness. Make me an agent of reconciliation. Amen.
